attributes.source:
---
title: pullreq Routes
---

# {% $markdoc.frontmatter.title %}

## Getting pullreq

### /pullreq

you can view all the pull requests and use their data to vote on the next one through these two routes 

#### get

no need for a payload here


### /pullreq/:id

#### get

no need for a payload here

## Creating a Pull Request

it is only done internally and not allowed for users to control it

## Voting for a Pull Request

you can use the post and put and delete routes of [Restaurants_page](/docs/restaurants) to vote for any pull request

## Pull Request Schema

```shell
{
     method: 'create' | 'update' | 'delete'

    suggested_data: Restaurant,

    number_of_voters: [String]

    active: Boolean,

    createdAt:string

    updatedAt:string
}
```

## Next steps

- [See Common Questions](/docs/faq)
